name: Ngoc Tu Hotel
address: Cau Quan, Son Tay, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated opposite Lan Chi supermarket, Ngoc Tu Hotel is just 3 km from Hanoi’s Old Quarter. Offering complimentary Wi-Fi access, it also provides sauna and massage services.

The hotel is 1 km from Trung Son market. It is 40 km from Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum and 60 km from Noi Bai International Airport.

Rooms are air-conditioned, and feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a wardrobe and a minibar. The en suite bathroom comes with shower facilities and toiletries.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist with luggage storage, laundry and ironing services. Free private parking spaces are available for both cars and motorcycles.

rooms.name: Double Room with Two Double Beds
